analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#88-89) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#266-285)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#365-379)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#436-439) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#211-226):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#223-224)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#224-225)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#463-474) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#468-469)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#405-406) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#441-444)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#436-439)
	- /unique_chucks/35/0xec08fda4c40e0b0d8927eabd1e6f1105f2398473.sol#438-439
